duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and process basic customer and cash transactions.
Identify opportunities for customer referral to contribute to branch sales goals.
Adhere to all laws and regulations governing bank operations, including compliance with BSA/AML Policy and Procedures.
Identify and escalate risk concerns through proper channels.
Develop and maintain knowledge of bank products and services.
Adapt to changing digital channels and perform other assigned duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent is required. Previous cash handling and customer service experience is preferred.
